item.title: US to remove Syria's HTS from list of foreign terror groups
item.description: The Islamist group led a rebel offensive that toppled Syria's Assad regime in December.

item.title: Watch: Timelapse shows how suddenly Texas flood waters rose
item.description: Footage shows how the banks of the Llano River rose quickly over the course of an hour.

item.title: Young campers, teachers and football coach among Texas flood victims
item.description: At least 91 lives were lost near the Guadalupe River after a deluge on Friday, authorities say.

item.title: Watch: Moment pet lion pounces on woman in street
item.description: CCTV footage shows the moment a lion leaps over a concrete wall before attacking a woman.

item.title: At least 10 dead in Kenya protests as central Nairobi sealed off
item.description: These are the latest in a wave of anti-government protests over the past year.
